shlok_hindi: उत्क्रामन्तं स्थितं वापि भुञ्जानं वा गुणान्वितम् ।
shlok_hinglish: utkrāmantaṃ sthitaṃ vāpi bhuñjānaṃ vā guṇānvitam
shlok_english: Him, who departs, stays and enjoys, who is united with GUNAS, the deluded do not see; but they do behold Him, who posses the eye-of-Knowledge.

defs.meaning: under the spell of the modes of material nature
those who have the eyes of knowledge.
